document_data.name: Dragon Tortoise
document_data.mainbody: '''Dragon tortoises''' were terrestrial creatures that, like their aquatic cousins the [[dragon turtle]]s, were related to [[dragon]]s.
document_data.Description: They had massive shells, within which could form very small crevices that made suitable homes for tiny creatures.
document_data.Combat: These creatures were capable of breathing out a destructive blast of [[sand]] that spewed outward in a {{SI|60|ft}} cone, slashing away at the flesh of its foes.
document_data.Ecology: Dragon tortoises were observed to live for other thousands of years.
document_data.Notable Dragon Tortoises: * [[Ogruhl]], a tortoise of ancient [[Netheril]] that was abandoned and later adopted by a band of desert [[chwinga]]s.
